pages.title: Overview
pages.text: Range increases Y bounds an Upgrade can effect.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: This can be Obtained from Villagers. Normal Enchanting, and Enchanting Focused Book (Range).

pages.title: Focus Book (Range)
pages.text: Effective Enchanting levels are 0-50 by Default, Some mods may modify this enchant level ceiling.

pages.title: Levels
pages.text: Range effectively has no limit to how large an area the upgrade can effect. $(li)Min Level 1. $(li)Max Level 5.
